title: 15 14 15 "The Purr-fect plan""Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!"Transliteration: "Kuro o Taose! Otoko Usoppu Namida no Ketsui!" (Japanese:クロを倒せ!男ウソップ涙の決意!) Kōnosuke Uda Junki Takegami 614.4 February 23, 2000(2000-02-23)[29] December 18, 2004[30]
